Description: Rim and wall fragment with part of lug handle of East Greek grey ware pottery open vessel, probably a bowl; horizontally ridged outer surface; vertical piercing through handle; dark grey fabric core sandwiched between beige margins, with mica inclusions; dark slip on interior and exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GL.028)
